config.serverpause.general.pauseWhenAllP: Set to true to pause the server when all players are paused.
config.serverpause.general.pauseWhenNoPl: Set to true to pause the server when no players are connected.
config.serverpause.general.sendChatMessa: Send Chat Message When Pause State Changes
Set to true to send a chat message to all players when the server pause state changes.
